channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Traffic Collision; INC#1701; 07:29PM; 5400 N Canoga Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/40JyJWz; #WoodlandHills; PRELIM: Three car traffic collision with a total of five patients, including one or more trapped in the wreckage. No further details. Media Inquiries: LAPD Valley Traffic Division (Incident #3725); FS 84; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E305 E84 EM15 EM17 RA105 RA84 RA881 RA903 T105 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1439; 07:44PM; 14155 W Magnolia Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/49Bcvdi; Sherman Oaks; FIRE NOW OUT: Firefighters located a small kitchen fire in a 2nd floor unit of a two story garden style apartment building. They quickly extinguished the fire and transported an adult male patient in serious condition with various burn injuries. LAFD Arson is responding for the investigation per protocol for a burn injury. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 7:31PM. No further details. ; FS 88; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; AR1 BC10 E102 E239 E288 E39 E99 RA39 RA839 T39 T88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#0811; 12:54PM; 10300 N De Soto Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uatnYn; Chatsworth; Two car collision with one car rolled over. There is a sheared hydrant and a street light down. Firefighters conducted an auto extrication to safely remove one patient from a vehicle and. The patient was transported in unknown condition (age/gender ?). LA DWP are responding for hydrant/light down. Questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc#1840. No further details.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 CM40 CM42 E229 E27 E287 E69 E8 EM15 HR3 RA107 RA70 T29 T87 UR88; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

title.a: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire 11/12/2023 INC#0642

item.description: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire; INC#0642; 11:37AM; 22400 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/40xlJDn; Chatsworth; Firefighters stopped all forward progress. There are no structures damaged but there are downed wires which may impact power in the area. Southern California Edison (SCE) and LA DWP notified. Firefighters will remain on scene conducting mop up operations. No further details. ; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC15 BC17 CE83 CM40 CM42 E104 E106 E107 E28 E290 E296 E70 E72 E8 E90 EM15 H1 H3 H4 H7 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA7 T90 T96 WT88; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Brush Fire; INC#0642; 10:52AM; 22400 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/40xlJDn; Chatsworth; Approximately one acre, slow moving in medium brush with winds estimated at 5-10mph. There are no structures threatened. Los Angeles County and Ventura County Fire also responding.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC15 BC17 E104 E106 E107 E28 E290 E296 E70 E72 E90 EM15 H1 H3 H4 H7 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA7 T90 T96; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart

Traffic - Multi-Casualty Incident; INC#1614; 09:46PM; 930 W King Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QUfwy7; Exposition Park; Multi-vehicle collision with a total of 12 patients. Five patients transported in *at least* serious condition. Of the seven remaining patients, two were transported with non-life threatening injuries and five declined LAFD transport. Any questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Inc# 3453. The original 9-1-1 call was received at 8:44PM.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E15 E215 E46 EM1 EM13 EM9 HR3 RA14 RA15 RA34 RA46 RA813 RA814 RA815 RA846 T15; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#1397; 06:19PM; 18101 W Roscoe Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/40qgAwN; Northridge; Two car collision with auto fire, wires down on all four corners, and a sheared hydrant. There was no one trapped. One patient is being assessed (age/gender/condition unknown). Questions regarding the collision are referred to LAPD Traffic Division Inc# 2894; FS 103; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E104 E273 E70 EM15 HR3 RA107 RA73 T73 UR88; CH8; 17; Margaret Stewart

title.a: KNOCKDOWN Boat or Ship Fire 11/11/2023 INC#1202

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Boat or Ship Fire; INC#1202; 04:16PM; Berth 85 Spd; MAP: https://bit.ly/47lyseM; San Pedro; The first arriving fire companies achieved a quick knockdown with one patient being evaluated for possible smoke inhalation. No further details.; FS 112; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT1 BT2 BT3 BT5 E101 E112 E248 E285 E48 RA101 RA112 T48 T85; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Boat Fire; INC#1202; 04:08PM; Berth 85 Spd; MAP: https://bit.ly/47lyseM; San Pedro; Approximately 50' sport fishing boat well involved in fire. Initial reports are no occupants on the boat.; FS 112; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 BT2 BT3 BT5 E101 E112 E248 E285 E48 RA101 RA112 T48 T85; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

title.a: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire - Forward Progress Stopped 11/11/2023 INC#0787

item.description: FORWARD PROGRESS STOPPED Brush Fire - Forward Progress Stopped; INC#0787; 12:42PM; Eb 210 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QCQFh2; Sunland; All forward progress stopped and incident will be handled by the LAFD resources onscene. LA County Fire and Verdugo Fire resources canceled. No injuries reported. No further details.; FS 24; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 BC14 CM40 CM42 E24 E260 E274 E290 E298 E39 E60 E7 E77 E98 EM14 H1 H3 H4 H7 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA7 RA77 RA90 T60 T74 T90 T98 WT88; CH5; 17; Margaret Stewart
